content:
Hello,
If we find an error in one of the public TestScripts, what's the process for reporting it and working with AEGIS to correct the script? Found an error that can't seem to be resolved within the Organization/Client Assigned Id script involving what appears to be a malformed jsonPath.

Screenshot of the error in question:
Screen-Shot-2022-03-27-at-1.23.34-PM.png

Quite confident that the the meta.versionId field exists in the response body that our server is sending back to Touchstone. But the .meta.versionId in that error message appears to have a prepended dot that doesn't conform to online jsonPath validators.
Hi @Abbie Watson thanks for emailing Touchstone Support - I see the ticket has been logged and response will be provided on the email thread. Have a good day!
